name: The Comfort Outlet
tag_list: cooling-mattress-pad, menopause-nightgown, cool-mens-pajamas, cat-bedding, body-pillow, cooling-sheets, chilipad-mattress, warming-blanket
description: Your place for all things Comfort
overview:
The Comfort Outlet offers comfort technology for men, women, children, and even the pets. The website is family owned by the Professional Education Associates LLC since 1996. Our philosophy is to offer only the best comfort products for low prices. Many of our products have been featured on tv, in magazines, and used by NASA. The Comfort Outlet prides themselves on outstanding customer service by taking the time to listen to our customers and then going above and beyond to meet their needs.

The Comfort Outlet offers consumers with a wide variety of great priced, quality items. We are Direct Sale Stores meanings that we serve as the retail representative for all the items we sell. Our flagship product lines consist of Outlast Technology Bedding, Cool-Jams, Confourm Technology, Haralee, Snoozer, Serta Mattresses, and Chili Technology.

Bamboo sheets bamboo robes Cal King heated mattress pad Chill pad bed mattress pad Sleepwear Memory Foam Mattress topper Cooling Gel Mattress Topper Towels and Robes Active Wear Animal Bedding Body Pillows Massagers Bedding Mattresses Inflatable Beds Pet Bedding Portable Chairs Warming Bedding
